metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10721 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: partclone.restore in Partclone 0.2.87 is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability due to insufficient validation of the partclone image header. An attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

criterions.comment: partclone: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
